conbody.p: (1)(iii) See DFARS PGI 250.101. Unless otherwise specified, the Contracting officer is responsible for maintaining all records under subpart 5150.1. Contracting officers shall submit the Command’s disposition by providing a copy of the contractor’s decisional letter to the Office of the Deputy Assistant Secretary of the Army (Procurement) (ODASA(P)) via email at usarmy.pentagon.hqda-asa-alt.list.saal-ps-staff@army.mil. ODASA(P) will maintain a record of all memorandums of decision executed at the Secretariat level.
